abstract: The Day: Agree with the Occupy Wall Street demonstrators or not, they are denouncing the recklessness of the financial titans who brought the economy to its knees. Also, what City Room is reading in other papers and blogs.
snippet: The Day: Agree with the Occupy Wall Street demonstrators or not, they are denouncing the recklessness of the financial titans who brought the economy to its knees. Also, what City Room is reading in other papers and blogs.
lead_paragraph: If the Occupy Wall Street protesters ever choose to recognize a person who gave their cause its biggest boost, they may want to pay tribute to Anthony Bologna.
